channel.title: spacex on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in spacex on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-17
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to make its own wireless chips for the iPhone (2 minute read) Apple is opening an office in southern California and hiring engineers to work on wireless radios, radio-frequency integrated circuits, and a wireless SoC.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-01
item.description: Elon Musk tells SpaceX employees that Starship engine crisis is creating a ‘risk of bankruptcy’ (3 minute read) SpaceX could face bankruptcy if it cannot achieve a Starship flight rate of at least once every two weeks next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-21
item.description: Google’s foldable phone plans include two devices, Android 12.1 release (4 minute read) Google is rumored to be working on two foldable phones and incorporating foldable functionality into an out-of-cycle update to Android.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-09
item.description: Google is planning a new Silicon Valley campus with hardware hub, plans show (4 minute read) Google is planning to build another Silicon Valley campus, dubbed ‘Midpoint’, with a center partly devoted to hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-14
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX inks satellite connectivity deal with Google Cloud (3 minute read) Google has signed a deal with SpaceX to use Starlink with its cloud unit.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-05
item.description: Watch SpaceX ACTUALLY hop Starship SN-5 150m!!! (55 minute video) SpaceX recently performed its first test flight on Starship SN-5.
